item.title: ChatGPT
item.description: My Use Cases> My Use Cases # Summarizing Video or Article Content Use https://downsub.com for video subtitles and https://chatgptsplitter.com/ for text Ask GPT-4 to summarize content in bullet points and elaborate on each point in detail For GPT-3.
